vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in BaseController.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.6.11<=0.6.12 (BaseController.sol#4): is has a complex pragma

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_manager' of BaseController. (BaseController.sol#13) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_addressRegistry' of BaseController. (BaseController.sol#13) is not in mixedCase

errors:

- method bz2: ReadError('not a bzip2 file')
- method xz: ReadError('not an lzma file')
- method tar: ReadError('empty file')
